info.description: REST API for Job Applier 3000 platform
info.title: Job Applier 3000 API

get.description: Retrieve all job applications in the system

post.description: Submit a job application for a specific job

get.description: Get all job applications that match query parameters
Retrieve a single job application by its ID

put.description: Update job application data (including status changes)

delete.description: Remove a job application by its ID

get.description: Allows a company to view files (resume, transcript, certification) of an applicant for a specific job application. Only the company who owns the job can access.
get.summary: Get applicant files for a job application

post.description: Uploads a PDF or image file for a specific user. Supports categories such as resume, profile_picture, etc.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for all files belonging to a specific user. Only the owner can view their files.
get.summary: List all files for a user

delete.description: Deletes a file by its ID. Only the owner of the file can delete it.

get.description: Downloads a file by its ID. Only the owner can access their files.

post.description: Add a new job posting to the database

get.description: Get jobs by filtering fields like title, location, salary, company, etc.

parameters.description: If true, returns the latest 3 jobs
parameters.name: latest

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific job posting

put.description: Update a job posting by ID

delete.description: Delete a job posting by ID and notify applicants

get.description: Fetch all user documents from the database.

post.description: Add a new user document to the database.

get.description: Retrieve users that match the specified query parameters. Supported parameters: `id`, `role`.
Retrieve a single user document by its ID.

put.description: Modify user data by providing the user ID in the path and updated JSON body.

delete.description: Remove a user document from the database by ID.
